function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Young people between 18 and 30 are the most psychologically affected by the pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health disorders in young people.","Mitigation":"Increase access to mental health services and support for young people.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online counseling platforms.","People":"Young people between 18 and 30.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health professionals."},{"Description":"Loss of income during the COVID-19 crisis is associated with poor mental health.","Impact":"Higher incidence of anxiety, stress, and depression due to financial stress.","Mitigation":"Financial assistance programs, mental health support for affected individuals.","Technologies":"Online financial assistance platforms, teletherapy services.","People":"Unemployed individuals, housewives, students.","Owner":"Government, mental health organizations."},{"Description":"Insufficient information and negative data contribute to high levels of anxiety and stress.","Impact":"Increased mental health disturbances related to misinformation and negative news.","Mitigation":"Responsible information dissemination, fact-checking, and mental health education.","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, mental health education platforms.","People":"General population.","Owner":"Media organizations, mental health advocates."}]}
